participant_1.background:
I value my independence and am looking for a partner who will respect that.
i like reading mystery novels.
i am a night owl , but i am an introvert so i do not go out much or anything.
I play video games to explore my artistic side and get a little bit of a thrill.
I'm grateful for my health and the ability to work on my farm.

participant_2.background:
My earliest memory is of playing in the woods behind my house.
My hair is usually auburn, but I occasionally dye it a different color to reflect my changing passions.
my passion is in programming.
I enjoy taking yoga classes and am always looking for new ways to improve my practice.
i am dissatisfied with the school life i have had so far.

content.text: Hi, I'm looking for a friend who is interested in reading mystery novels with me.
Hi, I'm interested in reading mystery novels. I'm also a night owl.
That's great! I'm also a night owl. What's your favorite mystery novel?
My favorite mystery novel is The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good book. What's your favorite genre of mystery novels?
I like psychological thrillers the best.
I know, right? I love the feeling of being on the edge of my seat when I'm reading a psychological thriller.
So, what are some of your favorite psychological thrillers?
I like The Girl on the Train and Gone Girl.
I've read both of those! They were both really good.
I know, right? They're so suspenseful.
I'm glad we have similar taste in books.
Me too! We should be friends.
